title: Simba 2.0: A Leap into Machine Learning with 94% Accuracy on MNIST
summary: This article showcases a significant milestone for Simba 2.0: The successful implementation of the k-Nearest Neighbors (kNN) algorithm. By integrating the powerful KDTree data structure and the kNearestClassify method, Simba 2.0 now enters the realm of machine learning.

title: Solving compass angle in Simba 2.0
summary: A fun walkthrough for solving for a relative angle between two vectors using the game Runescape as our test-suit.

title: Solving doors by Anchor in RS
summary: A walkthrough of using my code published on my gist for handling doors in various places around the game RuneScape - Code we are refering to: https://gist.github.com/slackydev/9da5b818db0ecd89aa846af999db5314

title: Various algorithms
summary: A small snapshot of the various algorithms I've made over the years focusing on computational geometry
